thread.section_title: Shipito Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shipito | www.shipito.com
thread.title: Sameh Ebrahim

author: Sameh Ebrahim
title: Sameh Ebrahim
text: I shipped with them to save taxes but I end up paying double what I was paying with MYUS plus the worst customer service and late shipping and late reply to my requests. the order is ready to mail out 4 days after they received it and after 2 days the carrier DHL returned my order back to them as missing something then another 4 days to be ready to ship it again and again missing documents so TNT has to wait 5 days to get the required paper and finally the order delivered after one month of having it while it just takes 3-4 days to get it delivered to the final destination in Canada with MYUS. I will never deal with SHIPITO again and will stay with MYUS for now.
